mil3.6.3:0.3: Characteristics of a Great Person Question
mil3.6.3:1.2: “Venerable Nāgasena, was the Buddha endowed with the thirty-two marks of a great person and distinguished with the eighty secondary characteristics, with radiant complexion, skin like gold, and a halo that extends for one fathom?”
mil3.6.3:2.1: “But, venerable sir, were his mother and father endowed with the thirty-two marks of a great person … and a halo that extends for one fathom?”
mil3.6.3:5.1: Characteristics of a Great Person Question third
